meta_description: The Art Center of Western Colorado in Grand Junction, Colorado, offers arts education programs for children and adults, an exhibition venue for artists, and a Permanent Collection that preserves Colorado’s rich history and culture.
hours_text:
###### 1803 N. 7th Street  
Grand Junction, Colorado  
Hours: Tuesday – Saturday, 9 am to 4 pm

Admission to The Art Center is $5. There is no admission charge for members, children under 12 or for entry to the Gift Gallery. Be sure to check the [News and Announcements](https://gjartcenter.org/news) section for exceptions to our usual hours and our [Current Exhibitions](https://www.gjartcenter.org/exhibitions/current) page to see what exhibitions are currently open.

Tuesdays are FREE to everyone thanks to the generous sponsorship of

#### Directions to the Art Center

From I-70

Take exit #31, Horizon Drive. At The bottom of the off-ramp you’ll take a LEFT and go under the overpass (if you’re coming from the east), you’ll turn RIGHT at the bottom of the off-ramp (if you’re coming from the west).

Continue on Horizon Drive till you come to a Round-About, take the second RIGHT, which keeps you on Horizon Drive. You’ll come to 7th Street (where Horizon Drive ends) Turn Left onto 7th Street. Follow 7th Street till it intersects with Orchard Ave. The Art Center is on the SW corner of Orchard Ave. and 7th Street.

From Highway 50

Traveling North on HWY 50, proceed into downtown Grand Junction (over the Colorado River). HWY 50 becomes 5th Street and you’ll stay on 5th Street heading North till you reach North Avenue. Turn RIGHT onto North Ave. and get into the left lane. Turn LEFT onto 7th Street and follow 7th Street North till you see Orchard Ave. The Art Center is on the SW cor...
